    • getProductImage

      @GetMapping("/image") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'CONSUMER\')") @ResponseStatus(code=OK) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getProductImage(@RequestParam String name) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Returns the image of a product via its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the image URL or an error message.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException
